data.title: @onAnycreate
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when a bot is created. Sent immediately after @onCreate is sent.

data.title: @onAnyBotClicked
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when a bot is clicked.

data.title: @onAnyBotPointerEnter
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the mouse cursor starts to hover over a bot.

data.title: @onAnyBotPointerExit
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the mouse cursor stops hovering over a bot.

data.title: @onAnyBotPointerDown
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the user starts clicking a bot.

data.title: @onAnyBotPointerUp
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the user stops clicking a bot.

data.title: @onChat
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the player sends a chat message. Chat messages can be sent when the player presses the Enter key while writing a message or by clicking/tapping the 'Send Message' button to the right of the chat bar.

data.title: @onChatTyping
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the player changes the text in the chat bar. Only triggered when the chat bar is visible.

data.title: @onFileUpload
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the user drags a file into the window.

data.title: @onGridClick
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the user clicks on empty space.

data.title: @onGridDown
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the user starts clicking on empty space.

data.title: @onGridUp
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the user stops clicking on empty space.

data.title: @onPortalChanged
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when a portal changes on the config bot.

data.title: @onBarcodeScanned
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the player scans a barcode.

data.title: @onBarcodeScannerOpened
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the barcode scanner is opened.

data.title: @onBarcodeScannerClosed
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the barcode scanner is closed.

data.title: @onQRCodeScanned
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when a QR Code is scanned.

data.title: @onQRCodeScannerOpened
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the QR Code Scanner is opened.

data.title: @onQRCodeScannerClosed
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the QR Code Scanner is closed.

data.title: @onImageClassified
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when an image has been classified.

data.title: @onImageClassifierOpened
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the image classifier is opened.

data.title: @onImageClassifierClosed
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the image classfier is closed.

data.title: @onPhotoCaptured
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when a picture has been captured from the photo camera.

data.title: @onPhotoCameraOpened
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the photo camera is opened.

data.title: @onPhotoCameraClosed
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots when the photo camera is closed.

data.title: @onTapCode
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots whenever a 4-digit tap code is entered.

data.title: @onKeyDown
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots whenever the user starts pressing a key.

data.title: @onKeyUp
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots whenever the user stops pressing a key.

data.title: @onKeyRepeat
data.concept: A shout that is sent to all bots whenever the user holds down a key and it automatically fires 'repeated key event'. (This is like when you hold down the 'a' key and then the computer starts continually typing 'a' characters until you stop holding the key

data.title: @onInstJoined
data.concept: A shout that is sent when a inst is loaded. An inst is considered loaded once all the bots in each space have been added (See #onBotAdded). Sent to every inst that is loaded.

data.title: @onInstLeave
data.concept: A shout that is sent when a inst is unloaded. Sent to every inst that is loaded.

data.title: @onInstStreaming
data.concept: A shout that is sent when an inst is connected and fully synced. Note that this can occur multiple times throughout the lifetime of a session because the player can lose and regain its connection to the inst. Sent to every inst that is loaded.
